title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 301.3 - Effective date of option selection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 301.3 - Effective date of option selection

State Regulations
A five year certain option or a 10 year certain option shall
not become effective if the member dies before the effective date of his
retirement, or within 30 days after the filing in the office of the Comptroller
of the application for his retirement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2

301.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
